title: Bug 4329: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog
description: When performing a search via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: Currently, when searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are shown. The search does not return any matches.
EB: The expected behavior is that the search should display matching results when performed via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software
2. Navigate to the Package view
3. Select a package
4. Use the search functionality within the Package view selection and dialog
5. Observe that no results are displayed
